page.title: 06Industry in Grampound Road
page.content: Ladock Asphalt make mastic asphalt roofing and they sell roofing,tanking, wood strip and block flooring. They make floors for squash courts and sell carpets and mastic. The mastic is melted and put on the roof like glue to keep the felt on the roof. Probus Pork is a butchers and freezer centre. Ashmeads make and sell farm buildings, pipes and cement and they treat wood against rot. The Cattle Breeding Centre store bulls eggs to breed calves. At the sandwich workshop they make sweets and sandwiches.They sell the food to the shops and offices in Truro and St. Austell. People ring them up and order their lunch. The Computer Workshop sells discs and all kinds of software. The Mechanic Workshop repairs radios and all kinds of electrical things.
